Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for registering for the two-day Spring Microservices Workshop on 26 - 27 July 2017 at Pivotalâ€™s Singapore office. Please click on the link below to pay your course fees (SG$ 206.25 Per Participant) via PayPal prior to the day of the event to secure your spot.
Please take note that you will need to bring your own laptop (with 8GB RAM) and be experienced with Java. We will use Java 8, Spring, Spring Data, JPA, Spring Boot, Spring Cloud, Cloud Foundry, Neo4J and MongoDB. Before you attend the class, please ensure that you sign up and activate the trial ID of Pivotal Web Services <[[http://run.pivotal.io/spring/?utm_source=apj-field-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=apj-event-spring-microservices-workshop_sg_q317]]> at http://run.pivotal.io <[[http://run.pivotal.io/spring/?utm_source=apj-field-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=apj-event-spring-microservices-workshop_sg_q317]]>.
We look forward to seeing you at the training!
